title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: When viewing the Project Properties Info page, the fields (such as Path, Type, etc.) are displayed as editable text fields.
EB: The fields on the Project Properties Info page should be displayed as read-only labels instead of editable text fields.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Select a Project. 
2. Right-click and choose 'Properties'. 
3. Navigate to the Info page on the subsequent dialog. 
4. Observe that the fields (Path, Type, etc.) are editable text fields instead of read-only labels.
